game.title: Eternal Fate
game.synopsis: Eternal Fate is a thrilling action-adventure game set in a dystopian future world torn between reality and illusion, forcing the protagonist to challenge their perceptions to unravel the truth.
game.beginning: The game begins in the city of Noctis, a massive, seemingly-utopian metropolis, where the player, an ordinary citizen, has their world turned upside down after they begin to see fragments of an alternate, dystopian world seeping into their reality.
game.ending: In the finale of Eternal Fate, the hero defeats the manipulative Overlord, breaking the illusion over Noctis. They take the helm, promising to guide their city into a truthful era, acknowledging the bitter reality yet embracing the hope for a better tomorrow.
